descriptor.detail: Shep is a GUI task tracking app designed for text based inputs. Shep was developed as a brown-field iterative breadth first project stemming from Duke, a chatbot developed for NUS's intro to Software Engineering Course.

one.descriptor: Users can add different types of tasks with different attributes, such as to-dos, deadlines, and events. Users can mark tasks as done, delete tasks, and listing all current tasks.

two.descriptor: A storage component to ensure that task data is persistently managed across user sessions. Whenever a user is done with a session, the storage component writes to a file. Launching Shep reads from said file.
